name: closeted
content:
closeted adjective
(SECRET)
Add to word list
Add to word list
used to describe a person who is not heterosexual (= sexually attracted to men if they are a women and women if they are a man) or not cisgender (= having a gender that matches the body they were born with) but keeps that fact secret from other people: The book portrays him as a closeted bisexual. We want to make it easier for people who might still be closeted, or exploring their gender expression, to feel comfortable enough to talk about it.Synonym
in the closetNote: Closeted can have a negative meaning to some people.
used to describe an activity or opinion that someone keeps secret: closeted political dissent
More examplesFewer examplesAs a young, closeted trans man, I had an uncomfortable relationship with my male peers.

closeted adjective
(STAYING INDOORS)
If someone is closeted somewhere, they stay there, often because they are working hard on something: She is currently closeted at home working on her new book.
